definition: again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)

sentences.english: Children at that age are only copies of their mother.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們，在那種小小年紀總是母親的再版。

sentences.english: Reproduced here by permission of the PMI.
sentences.chinese: 得到PMI的許可在這裏進行了再版。

sentences.english: I am told that one of my articles has been reprinted in the magazine.
sentences.chinese: 有人告訴我我的一篇文章已在那家雜誌上重印再版。

sentences.english: In the next twenty years it went through fourteen editions.
sentences.chinese: 在後來的二十年裏，該書再版了十四次。

sentences.english: It differs from reprinted publication in that a reprint cites sources.
sentences.chinese: 與單行本出版物的不同之處在於再版引用出處。

sentences.english: A new chapter is included in the second edition.
sentences.chinese: 這本書再版時插入了新的一章。

sentences.english: The now-infamous" Wand Order Problem" was corrected in later editions of the book.
sentences.chinese: 目前身名狼藉的“魔杖倒序問題”在再版中被更正了。

sentences.english: Teaching materials need to be emended and reprinted continuously because of their using attributes.
sentences.chinese: 教材的使用屬性決定教材需要不斷修訂和再版。

sentences.english: His first novel became a best seller and several firms offered to publish for him.
sentences.chinese: 他的第一部小說成了暢銷書，幾家公司要求爲他再版。

sentences.english: This article may be used for reprint as long as authors byline and live link is included.
sentences.chinese: 這篇文章可作再版只要作者函數住在內環線。

sentences.english: The book has sold about 14m copies and still sells steadily.
sentences.chinese: 這本書已被再版14次，銷售依然穩定。

sentences.english: Reprinted by permission of Doubleday & Company Inc. , Adapted by permission of the author.
sentences.chinese: 經由雙日股份有限公司准許再版，經作者准許改編。

sentences.english: The Collection of 300 Tang Poems will be reprinted next month.
sentences.chinese: 《唐詩三百首詩集》將於下月再版。

definition: the amount of books etc printed at one impression/print run
to set in print/to diffuse/to publish
to go to press/to submit for printing
a series of books/a collection of books
